title: Wanting to take a report further
body: I have recently been harassed by an inappropriate player and I would like to take the matter further as the player has gotten away with it and I don't want to let this slide, I'm sorry but telling someone to kill themselves is not okay in my books and I will be taking this further, whether it be with Riot, or with the Authorities. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Report them in-game and take a note of the account name.  Since you also want to enforce the reporting of the offender, submit a ticket via https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new which includes details of the offender and the content.
